DOC.brief_summary: A 10-week safety and tolerability study of a potential treatment for mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Tolerability Evaluation of Two 10-Week Dose Regimens of Orally-Administered PF-04494700 in Alzheimer's Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of probably Alzheimer's disease for at least 1 year. Mini Mental State Exam (MMSE) score between 1226 at screening. Participants must be receiving a cholinesterase inhibitor and/or memantine for at least 4 months, and on a stable dose for at least 2 months. Current evidence of a neurological or psychiatric illness that could contribute to dementia. Living alone. Poorly controlled high blood pressure.
